content.raw: My idea is to have a few dock block meshes available \(1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4\) and use a variable `block_size` in the `model.sdf.erb` . The generator will take the dimensions of this block into account and choose the right mesh. But for now, I think this is a good enough base line until we get the next round of meshes.
content.html: My idea is to have a few dock block meshes available (1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4) and use a variable block_size in the model.sdf.erb . The generator will take the dimensions of this block into account and choose the right mesh. But for now, I think this is a good enough base line until we get the next round of meshes.
